General.Name: Megaforce Co Ltd
General.Description: Megaforce Company Limited engages in the research and development of opto-mechatronics and plastic components in Taiwan, China, Mexico, and the United States. The company engages in precise plastic injection molding, micro-precision structure mold development, electronic assembly, and spray printing activities. It also offers dental electromechanical integration products, surgical systems, medical integration products through Internet of Things, and medical machinery products, as well as medical teaching courses. In addition, the company provides surface treatment, post process, and assembly services; and liquid silicone rubber molding and DFM products. The company's products are used in advanced computer gaming, high-end home entertainment equipment, vehicle components, medical appliances, and aerospace equipment, as well as in computer, communication, and consumer electronics products. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.16, Jian 8th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
